body_html:
Will TensorFlow work with CUDA 9.2?
My hunch is this change may involve changing the base image and the cuda packages installed as well as perhaps the paths to cuda.
What is the best way to test this change? Does CI build these Docker files?
body_text:
Will TensorFlow work with CUDA 9.2?
My hunch is this change may involve changing the base image and the cuda packages installed as well as perhaps the paths to cuda.
What is the best way to test this change? Does CI build these Docker files?
body:
Will TensorFlow work with CUDA 9.2? 
My hunch is this change may involve changing [the base image](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/294fdb0c5452715ec46d0555245e3b130308ebb4/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu#L1) and the [cuda packages installed](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/294fdb0c5452715ec46d0555245e3b130308ebb4/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu#L7-L17) as well as perhaps the paths to cuda.
What is the best way to test this change? Does CI build these Docker files?
